content: arms/legs make 4 start with a magic_ring or chain 2 using white yarn round 1 4 single_crochet into magic_ring or first chain 4 round 2 increase in each st 8 round 3 single_crochet in each st 8 switch to gray yarn rounds 4-10 single_crochet in each st 8 finish off leave long tail for sewing arms legs don t need it arms flatten and sew to body very close to head legs insert legs into body use yarn that matches the last round of body to sew bottom of body closed while also attaching legs
